detail_desc: Calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short dress in cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Long dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front, wide tie at the waist and short, double-layered sleeves. Unlined.
Long dress in viscose jersey with a lace bodice. Wide neckline with a V-neck at the back, short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a visible seam centre back, long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Long dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with flounces around the armholes, short, narrow shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a wide skirt with gathers at the top. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Short, fitted lace dress with V-neck, gathers at the front and long, transparent sleeves. Contrasting colour lining front and back.
Fitted dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and a decorative knot at the front.

Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a decorative belt with a metal buckle.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a short gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides, and a gathered, draped skirt. Lined.
Short, sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with pleats at the top and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with short sleeves.

Short dress in an airy weave with pin-tucks at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lace sections at the cuffs and hem. Jersey inner dress.
Long dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front, wide tie at the waist and short, double-layered sleeves. Unlined.
Short, flounced dress in soft, woven viscose with a wrapover front, long-sleeves, a seam at the waist and a tie at the side. Unlined.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a visible seam centre back, long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short sleeves.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a decorative belt with a metal buckle.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Wide, sleeveless dress in softly draping jersey. Unlined.
Short dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Narrow, detachable belt at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.

Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with an opening and narrow ties at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey inner dress.
Long, straight-cut shirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets with a pleat, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fitted dress in cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey.
Short dress in soft jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves, seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Straight-cut dress in stretch jersey with a round neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.

Short dress in soft, patterned viscose with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at the waist and long sleeves. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a square neckline, an opening with a decorative tie detail at the front and long sleeves.

Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Short jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar with a button at the back of the neck and an opening front and back. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in airy satin with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, a drawstring at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
